item.title: Yield Curve Inversion - Marks End to Bull Market?
item.description: Going, Going, Inverted! Yield Curve inversions are typically a leading indicator for a recession Historic analysis on inversions for specific yields since 1990 Yield Curve over 5 different time frames since the start of 2018 Takeaway from recent inversions Yield Curve Inversion Iâ€™ve always followed bank stocks ever since I first began investing almost 6 years ago. Once I learned the 10-year and 2-year treasury spread was a profit driver for the big banks, I began to track the daily fluctuations.
